name: Lish Inc.
description: Provider of an on-demand food delivery platform. The company's on-demand food delivery platform connects busy people with local chefs enabling customers to discover and order healthy home cooked dinners and meals hand-made by local chefs delivered at their homes and place of work.
one_liner: Provider of an on-demand food delivery platform. The company's on-demand food delivery platform connects busy people with local chefs enabling customers to discover and order healthy home cooked dinners and meals hand-made by local chefs delivered at their homes and place of work.
